One of the greatest, if not the greatest RTS game of all time. Age of Empires II is one of the best strategy games I have ever played. The game lets you build your own medieval kingdom, manage resources, and lead armies into battle. You can play in many different ways: relax and focus on building, enjoy story campaigns that teach real history, or play fast and competitive matches against other players or the AI.

The game has many unique civilizations, each with its own units and bonuses. The balance is very good, so every strategy can work if you plan well. It always feels exciting to grow your economy, train your army, and fight for victory.

Even after many years, the game is still active and always improving. I keep coming back to it because every match feels different. If you like strategy and thinking ahead, I can strongly recommend this game.

We are still able to win but it's not like other RTS where there is a mixture of strategies. Just plop castle to interrupt enemy eco then rush/harass to keep them off their eco and slowly overwhelm. Sometimes it works out better then others.

Been playing for years now, disk version, Voobly, HD, then DE.
